argument.name: SQL::Query
argument.description: A SQL::Query object created with a DIM statement.

page.discussion: The ReleaseConnection() method clears the SQL::Query.connection property.
page.example: dim qry as SQL::Query dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v7\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" qry.parse("Select * from Customer") ? qry.OpenConnection(connString) = .T. ? qry.ReleaseConnection() =
